Package org.severe.jripples.modules.manager

Modules Manager package.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ModuleSwitchListener ModuleSwitchListener interface should be implemented by classes who wish to be notified upon activation and deactivation of the JRipples modules.
 

Class Summary
ConfigurationAction Pull-down action that provides a menu for switching between JRipples modules.
JRipplesModuleLoader Provides a convinient access to attributes of the module, defined in JRipples extension point of this module.
ModuleProxy ModuleProxy class is used to manipulate modules, installed in Eclipse environment for JRipples tool.
ModuleSwitchEvent This class represents an event of activation and / or deactivation of JRipples modules.
 

Package org.severe.jripples.modules.manager Description

Modules Manager package.
